entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:44 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -36.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 10:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 39. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 57 in the morning and minus 52 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37 with temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 37 with temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill minus 55 in the evening and minus 48 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
